00015 #include "config.h"

00019 #include "fsal_internal.h"
00020 #include "fsal_convert.h"
00021 #include "fsal_common.h"

00024 
00066 fsal_status_t FSAL_rename(
00067     fsal_handle_t         * old_parentdir_handle,      /* IN */
00068     fsal_name_t           * p_old_name,                /* IN */
00069     fsal_handle_t         * new_parentdir_handle,      /* IN */
00070     fsal_name_t           * p_new_name,                /* IN */
00071     fsal_op_context_t     * p_context,                 /* IN */
00072     fsal_attrib_list_t    * src_dir_attributes,        /* [ IN/OUT ] */
00073     fsal_attrib_list_t    * tgt_dir_attributes         /* [ IN/OUT ] */
00074 ){
00075   
00076   int rc;
00077   
00078   /* sanity checks.
00079    * note : src/tgt_dir_attributes are optional.
00080    */
00081   if ( !old_parentdir_handle ||
00082        !new_parentdir_handle ||
00083        !p_old_name ||
00084        !p_new_name ||
00085        !p_context )
00086     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00087   
00088   TakeTokenFSCall();
00089   
00090   rc = hpss_RenameHandle(
00091          &(old_parentdir_handle->ns_handle),
00092          p_old_name->name,
00093          &(new_parentdir_handle->ns_handle),
00094          p_new_name->name,
00095          &(p_context->credential.hpss_usercred)
00096       );
00097   
00098   ReleaseTokenFSCall();
00099   
00100   /* convert the HPSS EEXIST error to the expected error ENOTEMPTY */
00101   if ( rc == HPSS_EEXIST )
00102     Return( ERR_FSAL_NOTEMPTY, -rc, INDEX_FSAL_rename );
00103   
00104   /* the source or the target directory handles may be stale */
00105   if ( rc == HPSS_ENOTDIR || rc == HPSS_ENOENT )
00106   {
00107     if ( HPSSFSAL_IsStaleHandle( &old_parentdir_handle->ns_handle,
00108                                  &p_context->credential.hpss_usercred ) ||
00109          HPSSFSAL_IsStaleHandle( &new_parentdir_handle->ns_handle,
00110                                  &p_context->credential.hpss_usercred ))
00111     {
00112       Return( ERR_FSAL_STALE, -rc, INDEX_FSAL_rename );
00113     }
00114   }
00115     
00116   /* any other error */
00117   if (rc) Return( hpss2fsal_error(rc), -rc, INDEX_FSAL_rename );
00118   
00119   
00120   /* optionnaly get attributes */
00121   
00122   if( src_dir_attributes ){
00123     
00124     fsal_status_t st;
00125         
00126     st = FSAL_getattrs( old_parentdir_handle, p_context, src_dir_attributes );
00127     
00128     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( st ) )
00129     {
00130       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( src_dir_attributes->asked_attributes );
00131       FSAL_SET_MASK( src_dir_attributes->asked_attributes,
00132           FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR );
00133     }
00134 
00135   }
00136   
00137   if( tgt_dir_attributes ){
00138     
00139     fsal_status_t st;
00140     
00141     /* optimization: */
00142     
00143     if (  ! FSAL_handlecmp( old_parentdir_handle, new_parentdir_handle, &st )
00144           && src_dir_attributes ){
00145       
00146       /* If source dir = target dir, we just copy the attributes.
00147        * to avoid doing another getattr.
00148        */
00149 
00150       (*tgt_dir_attributes)=(*src_dir_attributes);
00151       
00152     } else {
00153       
00154       /* get attributes */
00155       st = FSAL_getattrs( new_parentdir_handle, p_context, tgt_dir_attributes );
00156           
00157       if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( st ) )
00158       {
00159         FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( tgt_dir_attributes->asked_attributes );
00160         FSAL_SET_MASK( tgt_dir_attributes->asked_attributes,
00161             FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR );
00162       }
00163 
00164       
00165     }
00166     
00167     
00168   }
00169     
00170   /* OK */
00171   Return(ERR_FSAL_NO_ERROR ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_rename);
00172   
00173 }
